title: Slurpee Waves Roll Ashore On Nantucket's Coast
teaser: In Massachusetts, where it's been very cold, the waves coming ashore on the island of Nantucket are partially frozen. Photographs of the waves make it seem like a big Slurpee is about to hit land.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
